course_description: This course familiarizes students with the multiplicity of the female voices that (re-)emerged in Japanese literature from the Meiji period (beginning 1868) to the late twentieth century. Texts are in English translation.
sections: Class Nbr: 1599, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 4-5:15p, Instructor: J. Bullock, Status: Open
